programme.title: Kultūrdeva
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Kultūrdeva" viesosies rakstniece Džena Andersone, kurai nācis klajā jauns romāns - "Demiurgs", kā arī režisors Mārtiņš Eihe un dramaturģe Laila Burāne, kuri sastrādājušies pēc Rūdolfa Blaumaņa darbu motīviem tapušās laikmeta traģikomēdijas "Trīs bēres un divas kāzas" uzvedumā Liepājas teātrī.

programme.title: Daudz laimes, jubilār!
programme.desc: Tūlīt pēc Ziemassvētkiem raidījumā "Daudz laimes, jubilār!" viesojas pats Ziemassvētku vecītis: ilggadējs Leļļu teātra režisors, bērnu izrāžu veidotājs, dramaturgs un dziesmu tekstu autors Valdis Pavlovskis, lielisks stāstnieks un jokotājs. Pavlovskis ir arī pirmais Veras Singajevskas balvas laureāts: tā ir godalga, kas tikusi izveidota tikai šogad, lai īpaši sekmētu izcilību bērniem domātos teātra iestudējumos. Valda Pavlovska radošo biogrāfiju iezīmē ap 50 režijas darbu Leļļu teātrī (1982-2022), taču, šķiet, vēl ražīgāka ir viņa darbošanās un pienesums dramaturģijā: viņa leļļu un bērnu lugas iestudētas vairāk nekā 80 profesionālos teātros ne tikai Latvijā, bet arī Ukrainā, Polijā, Vācijā, Bulgārijā, Moldovā un citur. Valdis Pavlovskis ir arī vairāk nekā 150 dziesmu tekstu autors - tie rakstīti ne tikai bērnu izrādēm, ap divdesmit dziesmu ar Pavlovska vārdiem uz skatuves uznesa komponista Borisa Rezņika vadītā kulta grupa "Eolika". Nenoliedzami populārākā no visām ir "Baltijai": "Atmostas Baltija: Lietuva, Latvija, Igaunija!" - viena no Atmodas laika himnām. Ilgstoša radošā sadarbība Valdim Pavlovskim veidojusies arī ar lielo popmūzikas koncertu rīkotāju Aigaru Dinsbergu, kas vainagojusies Māras Zālītes, Jāņa Petera, Jāņa Lūsēna jubilejas un daudzos citos koncertos, nākamajā - Raimonda Paula jubilejas gadā - atkal solot jaunus muzikālus iespaidus.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: The Inca Empire rose in the 15th century, yet its origins remained shrouded in mystery for centuries. Follow Manco Capac, the first Inca and Pachacutec, the mythical emperor who reshaped a civilization. Pachacutec built Machu Picchu, revolutionized architecture, and drew on the legacy of an older society to rewrite his peoples history. Claiming the title "Son of the Sun," he expanded the empire beyond the Cuzco Valley, imposed a solar cult as the state religion, and even instituted human sacrifices to assert his power. With cutting-edge science and ultra-realistic 3D reconstructions from Machu Picchu to Chilean volcanoes, Lake Titicaca, and Cuzco, witness the breathtaking birth of the Empire of the Sun.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Maya
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin ventures into the Guatemalan jungle to explore how a new high-tech treasure map is revealing tens of thousands of ancient ruins. Now, dozens of archaeologists are heading on a voyage of discovery, exploring lost ruins for the first time in 1500 years. And what theyre finding is rewriting the history of one of the worlds most mysterious ancient civilisations - the Maya.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: A team of archaeologists investigate a priceless hoard of ancient treasure discovered in Laos. Their quest takes them to temple sites in the southeast Asian jungle as they try to find out who the stunning treasure belonged to and what it was used for. Astonishing new discoveries of gold and human remains open a window into the early years of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: An international team of archaeologists investigate a hoard of priceless ancient treasure discovered in the southeast Asian nation of Laos. Their mission takes them to temple sites in the jungle. Aerial scanning technology targets new areas for excavation where astonishing new discoveries are made as they as they explore the origins of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Tsunami: Race Against Time
programme.desc: A massive earthquake in the Indian Ocean sets off a tsunami that, within minutes, arrives in the bustling city of Aceh, causing unprecedented havoc and devastation. This film follows the desperate struggle to survive of city-dwellers in Indonesia and tourists in Thailand caught in the unfolding catastrophe, as well as the scientists working against the clock to warn the world.

programme.title: Hurricane Katrina: Race Against Time
programme.desc: After Hurricane Katrina passed, citizens soon discovered the levees breached, quickly flooding New Orleans like a bathtub. First responders and everyday citizens jumped in heroically to save locals; many residents were forced to flee their houses for dry land. As residents braved dangerous conditions to survive, ineptitude at all levels of government was exposed as the water rose.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Sir Ratan Tata is a man on a mission: to make Indias roads safer by getting people off motorbikes and into the worlds cheapest car - the Tata Nano. In India its common to see a family of four ride together on a motorbike. On bad roads in Monsoon rain thats a lethal way to commute. Tata envisages the Nano as a peoples car - Indias answer to the Model T. But to bring his car to the people he must overcome some formidable challenges. Design issues and skyrocketing costs threaten to blow out the cars $2200 price tag, and violent protests force him to dismantle and shift his 3 billion dollar Megafactory 2100km across India.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Megafactories is granted unprecedented access to elite Formula One team Williams F1. Back from their latest race in Europe, the team have a week to get the car in shape at their English HQ before they leave for months away on the other side of the globe. They must improve the aerodynamics and completely repair and rebuild the car at their state-of-the-art facility before they fly away. Cutting edge design and incredible technology need to come together as team race for success.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Ultimate Factories also known as Megafactories is an American documentary television series that premiered in 2006 on the National Geographic Channel. The program explores the inner workings of factories worldwide. Each episode profiles the machinery and manpower behind each factorys main product, featuring close-ups, breakdowns, interviews, and side stories to show the sequence of events to produce the product in the factory. Hoff Productions was one of the principal producers of this highly successful series. It also airs in non-US markets as Megafactories.

programme.title: Building the Channel Tunnel
programme.desc: The Channel Tunnel linking Britain with France is one of the seven wonders of the modern world but what did it take to build the longest undersea tunnel ever constructed? We hear from the men and women, who built this engineering marvel. Massive tunnel boring machines gnawed their way through rock and chalk, digging not one tunnel but three; two rail tunnels and a service tunnel. This was a project that would be privately financed; not a penny of public money would be spent on the tunnel. Business would have to put up all the money and take all the risks. This was also a project that was blighted by flood, fire, tragic loss of life and financial bust ups. Today, it stands as an engineering triumph and a testament to what can be achieved when two nations, Britain and France put aside their historic differences and work together.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europes finest cultural and geographical landmarks as youve never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent - a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: When an Arctic storm kicks off the coldest winter of a decade, Thord tries to rescue a truck blocking a blind bend but the driver ignores Thords instructions and puts all their lives at risk. A blizzard causes chaos for Bjorn when a jackknifed truck blocks the road. And in the far north, a truck full of fish on a tight deadline crashes into a snowbank so rescue boss Jo Roger has to get it back on track.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the shadow of the worlds oldest pyramids, a team of archaeologists led by Dr Ramadan Hussein have made the discovery of a lifetime - a fully intact burial complex buried deep beneath the sand. Packed with treasures and world firsts, the site has the potential to re-write the book on mummification, unlocking secrets forgotten since the age of the pharaohs. Now the team have to open every sarcophagus, investigate every mystery and decode every clue in this never before seen discovery - the first Egyptian funeral parlour ever found.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Mummies Compilations
programme.desc: In the shadow of the worlds oldest pyramids, a team of archaeologists led by Dr Ramadan Hussein have made the discovery of a lifetime - a fully intact burial complex buried deep beneath the sand. Packed with treasures and world firsts, the site has the potential to re-write the book on mummification, unlocking secrets forgotten since the age of the pharaohs. programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 38 years, the remains of a young woman - found murdered by the side of a freeway outside of Tyler, Texas - have sat inside a cardboard box in the Smith County Sheriffs Office. Now, with retirement looming, Detective David Turner is teaming up with the DNA Doe Project to solve the case, find her family and - finally - lay her to rest.

programme.title: Year Million
programme.desc: Humans have always had a drive to explore the unknown. This indomitable spirit has led us to new shores, new depths and, in the last century, to new planets. As the number of mysteries remaining on home planet decreases, how will we have to adapt ourselves biologically in order to explore farther distances in space? Will we discover forms of life reminiscent of Earth or new forms of life entirely? What astrophysical phenomena may we experience, and how closely will it align to how weve imagined it in science fiction?

programme.title: Year Million
programme.desc: Advances in graphics and computing power have given rise to a renaissance in virtual technologies from world-building platforms like Second Life to manufacturers of VR headsets like Oculus Rift. Were seeing more and more of human activity transfer to virtual spaces, offering people profound experiences via online personas and even transforming the way the real-world functions. Will we reach a tipping point where reality becomes a pale shadow of the rich, imaginative, virtual worlds weve created for ourselves? What will that mean for our perception of humanity? What do we risk losing?

programme.title: Year Million
programme.desc: Within a single generation, the Internet has transformed virtually every aspect of modern culture from the way we learn and work to the ways in which we communicate and express ourselves. How has this constant connectivity affected our views on privacy? How will they continue to change as new technologies like neural prosthetics help us create seamless, instantaneous connections to the cloud? Eventually, will we evolve to the point of telepathy? How will this affect our relationships to each other? Will this give us new tools or insight into communication with other civilizations that might exist beyond Earth?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: The show that combines cold hard science with some of the craziest, most spectacular and painful user generated clips ever recorded is back for a third season. Richard Hammond introduces a host of new mishaps featuring brave, if misguided individuals from around the world and then explains the science behind their failure and humiliation with the use of bespoke animations and super slo-mo cinematography. Each week we show between 50 and 60 clips of misadventure - ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes. Each episode will feature several themes such as motorbike drifting, wakeboarding or attempting to fly drones. Clips are paused, re-wound, and re-played as we analyse exactly what went wrong and why. Richard Hammond explains the physics, chemistry and biology at play, by presenting forensic detail to explain the stupidity that resulted in failure. Hell study everything from acceleration to aero dynamics, fluid pressure to combustion and human anatomy to flammability. This is misadventure explained. This is The Science of Stupid.

programme.title: Akashinga: The Brave Ones
programme.desc: Petronella Chigumbura and her fellow all-female anti-poaching rangers put out a call to the local community in Zimbabwe for single mothers, abandoned wives, and survivors of sexual and domestic violence to enroll in an intense training selection to attempt to join the rangers and help them protect elephants and other wildlife from poachers across Africa.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Just 4 minutes after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, on 4 November 2010, Qantas Flight 32 suffered an uncontained failure in one of its engines. The failure was the first of its kind for the Airbus A380, the worlds first double-deck jet airliner. Shrapnel from the engine damaged the fuel system and led to a series of failures, severely compromising the aircraft. The crew spent almost two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Chess-playing computers are nothing new today, but how did a robot beat the worlds best chess players back in 1770? Is this the worlds first artificial intelligence, or is there sleight of hand at play? Charles Lindbergh was arguably the worlds most famous man in the 1930s, as the first to fly non-stop across the Atlantic and then have his son tragically kidnapped. Lesser known is his invention of a singular glass pump of elegant design. What is it for? A 2,400-year-old mummy is brought from Egypt to Croatia by a collector. Only after it is donated to a museum does anyone realize that this mummy is wrapped in the rarest remnant of a lost language. The writing on the wrappings is pored over by experts to decipher it. What does it say?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Towering 13 feet tall and over 11,000 years old, the Vulture Stone is a mysterious message from the end of the Ice Age, one of many relief carvings found at the site of Gobekli Tepe in Turkey. What can its strange depictions of birds, a scorpion and a headless man mean? A disturbing dome-like mask with a box where the mouth should be is the legacy of 1920s inventor and sci-fi writer Hugo Gernsback. His goal was peace and quiet on demand, but did he instead pre-empt the medical and torture applications of sensory deprivation? In a Swiss church stands a fearsome skeleton clothed in a suit of armor that is as exotic as it is impractical. Who would go to the trouble of creating such an ornately macabre work of art, and whose skeleton is it?

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Interdiction agents in Mayaguez intercept traffickers coming from the Dominican Republic with over $60 million in cocaine onboard. In Fajardo, agents investigate a boat suspected of smuggling cocaine from St. Thomas to Puerto Rico. In the U.S Virgin Islands, agents search for a sunken vessel believed to be carrying bulk cash from drug dealers.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations newest agent in Mayaguez gets his first major seizure when he uncovers over $8 million of cocaine hidden inside a boat. Homeland Security Investigations arrests multiple longshoremen at a seaport involved in a smuggling ring responsible for importing cocaine from the Dominican republic. AMO agents in Fajardo and USVI team up and race to Culebra to intercept a smuggler.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Spatial disorientation is one of the leading causes of all air accidents. Even the most experienced pilots are susceptible to its subtle yet deadly effects. A confused John F. Kennedy Jr. disappears on the way to Marthas Vineyard. High over the Red Sea, a captain loses his bearings and crashes his passenger jet. And, off the coast of Indonesia, pilots fly their Boeing 737 into a violent storm and end up on the ocean floor.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Drawing the attention of the entire world, three fatal design flaws put air crash investigators in a storm of controversy. When one of former race car driver Niki Laudas planes nosedives into a Thai jungle, a one-in-a-million failure reveals a weak spot in every Boeing 767. A piece of the plane blows off a Turkish Airlines DC-10 causing the most catastrophic mid-air emergency of its time. And, a risky test flight is the only way to uncover the startling truth about what brought down Atlantic Southeast Airlines Flight 2311.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Sorting relics from the rubble, archeologists race against time and the elements to recover ancient Roman artifacts. They reveal new truths about Hadrians wall and Neros palace, discover beautiful frescos underground, dive underwater for remarkably preserved mosaics, and carefully recover part of a warship that alters Roman naval history.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: New discoveries and cutting-edge research reveal the origins of the greatest monument built by the Roman Empire - the Colosseum. Investigations across Italy explore the roots of this symbol of Roman power and the gladiator games that were held there. New archaeological findings at the Colosseum uncover evidence revealing the true extent of the structure and how it may have looked at its opening games.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: Cutting-edge research reveals how Romes emperors used the Colosseum to unite vast provinces and drive their empire to the peak of its power. Archaeologists dig beneath the Colosseum itself to reveal the true extent of the Roman games, discover the secrets of the gladiators, and unearth the remains of ancient beasts whose slaughter was at the centre of Romes most iconic landmark.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: The Colosseum and its gladiatorial games stand as a symbol of Romes power and reach for over a century until coins, recently discovered at the site, indicate an empire in crisis. What role does the Colosseum play in Romes decline and fall? Investigations take archaeologists to ruins in Austria, Tunisia, and Rome, as they uncover the story of the empires collapse.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: Nineveh was once the worlds greatest city. The Bible describes it as a wicked city of sinners, from which Jonah flees and is swallowed by a whale. This season, archaeologists in Iraq and Israel uncover never-before-seen stone reliefs and make a shocking discovery inside Ninevehs city gate: the skeletons of two teenagers brutally killed in battle. Did the city deserve its fearsome reputation?

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: The Bibles famous Tower of Babel, so tall it reached the heavens, exceeded all modern engineering wonders. We follow a season of excavations to discover if such a tower ever existed. Teams dig deep to reveal magnificent ancient monuments across Iraq and take to the skies to search Babylon for answers. New discoveries and immersive CGI shed light on the world in which this Bible story was written.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Every year millions of Christians take the pilgrimage to Jerusalem. They come to follow the Passion, the final steps of Jesus on his way to his death on the cross. Now one archaeologist claims they are worshipping at the wrong sites. He has tracked down crucifixion artifacts from the time of Christ and has been given unprecedented access to the most important shrine in Christendom - the place of the crucifixion. He believes he has discovered archaeological evidence that not only pin points the true locations but also provides fresh insights into the Passion of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Mary Magdalene has long been known as a repentant sinner, a saint, and perhaps most importantly, the witness to the resurrection. But author Margaret Starbird believes that she was also Jesus wife, mother of his child and victim of the biggest conspiracy in history. In this television exclusive she examines what some have claimed could be one of the earliest Christian artefacts ever discovered and untangles a riddle that she believes reveals the truth about this mysterious woman from the bible.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Violent cataclysms and fiery judgment fixate the popular imagination and fill numerous holy books. Morgan Freeman looks into this supposed future as well as past millennia of strife to determine how the world will end. His journey takes him to the desert that three faiths call home to pour over the Dead Sea Scrolls, and learn about the origins of the Jewish messiah. He decodes the enigmatic Mark of the Beast-666-in Rome, and sits down with a reformed Islamic terrorist. He travels to Guatemala to determine if the ancient Maya really predicted the end of the world, and learns from a psychologist why some people find comfort in catastrophes. On the brighter side, a visit with Hurricane Katrina survivors and a meditative session with one of the holiest men in all of Buddhism begins to realign Morgans perspective-what if the apocalypse is not a planetary bloodbath, but rather a mental paradigm shift?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Where does evil come from? In a maximum-security prison, Morgan comes face to face with a serial killer, and looks for the physical root of evil in his brain. In an ancient tomb, Egyptologist Salima Ikram shows Morgan a depiction of the "weighing of the heart", and the birth of the belief that what you did in this life mattered in the next. Psychologist Jesse Bering has discovered that children who believe they are being watching by an invisible being obey the rules more than those who dont. Morgan encounters Zoroastrianism, whose belief in a cosmic balance of good and evil inspired the Christian Devil. In India, he discovers that Hindu believes evil stems from the tormented souls of ones ancestors, who are merely in need of release. Morgan explores the idea of redemption, when he former Neo-Nazi skinhead Bryon Widner, who turned his back on a life of evil.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Just 4 minutes after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, on 4 November 2010, Qantas Flight 32 suffered an uncontained failure in one of its engines. The failure was the first of its kind for the Airbus A380, the worlds first double-deck jet airliner. Shrapnel from the engine damaged the fuel system and led to a series of failures, severely compromising the aircraft. The crew spent almost two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster..

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Deepwater Horizon explode causing the worst manmade oil spill in history? Why did the Air France Concorde crash barely a minute after take off? How did so many people die in an Austrian funicular trip up the inside of a mountain at Kaprun?

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lion V Buffalo. Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Katmai. In the wake of the largest volcanic eruption of the 1900s, the landscape in Katmai National Park regenerated, and a vibrant assembly of wildlife emerged. Witness the annual journey of brown bears, wolves, and salmon within the park.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Zion. Zions iconic landscapes feature soaring red spires. Beyond canyons and cliffs, water emerges as a surprising force. The humble Virgin River, sculpting a geologic masterpiece over millennia, sustains diverse life in Zion National Park.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Meet remarkable wildlife, from the steadfast Wapiti wolves and resilient bison to playful grizzly cubs.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Big Cats V Prey. From elephants charging with lions clinging to their tusks, to turf wars between male leopards and hyenas driving a lion off his own buffalo kill, this epic safari reveals raw nature at its fiercest.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Katmai. In the wake of the largest volcanic eruption of the 1900s, the landscape in Katmai National Park regenerated, and a vibrant assembly of wildlife emerged. Witness the annual journey of brown bears, wolves, and salmon within the park.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: One of the most unique countries in the world is made up of over 7,600 islands, with more than 20 active volcanos. Besides that, the Philippines is covered in rich green forests, while its beaches are full of coral reefs. All this makes it one of the most bio-diverse places on the planet and a home to many wonderful and unusual species.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Whether right whales, penguins or sea lions - for the birth of their young, many marine creatures are drawn to Argentinas nearly 5,000 kilometer coastline. From their very first breath, its all about one thing for the little ones: survival. Orcas hunt for young sea lions with a special technique and seagulls fly merciless aerial attacks on baby whales. Extraordinary underwater images and impressive animal behavior make the film by Christian Baumeister a visual experience.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: In Argentinas breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. And then there are the predators. A female puma stalks a valley in search of guanaco, while a tarantula defends itself against a hungry armadillo. Foxes will scavenge what they can…until one of the worlds largest vultures shows up. All the while, in the background, glaciers greedily hold on to the freshwater these animals so desperately need.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Typically South Africa is known for the Big Five: lions, leopards, buffalo, elephants and rhinos. But not for Lucy Cooke, advocate and avenger for the lesser-known and unloved animals of the world. Lucys on a hunt for the more enigmatic Freaky Five: Cape vultures, sungazer girdled lizards, golden-brown baboon tarantulas, ground pangolins, and chacma baboons. The Freaky Five are all important to South Africans and their traditions. Mystical and mysterious, these five animals represent a side of South African culture that the tourists and conservation donors both often overlook. But Lucy Cooke is on a mission to change all of that!

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. Along the way, she finds many other "odd ones" - animals that have come up with all kinds of strange adaptations so they can survive in the forest of Borneo. Lucy finds dung beetles in action - eating dung; frogs that fly; a tarsier, with eyes that are bigger than its brain; and the wooly bat that makes its home is a carnivorous plant

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins

programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees; Ryan reveals the steps to finding "the one", underdog style.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Polar Worlds with Bertie Gregory Mashup
programme.desc: The North and South poles - one force determines everything for the animals who call these regions home: water. Wildlife filmmaker Bertie Gregory travels towards both extremes of the Earth to find the creatures who have mastered surviving in the icy waters of some of the planets harshest landscapes.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Bertie aims to film thousands of migrating predators as they unite for one of the oceans most spectacular feeding events off the coast of Portugal.

programme.title: Wild Life
programme.desc: Join wildlife filmmaker Bertie Gregory on a magical journey, as he visits stunning locations across the world to capture the beauty of some of our planets most remarkable species. Traversing unique landscapes and unrelenting environments, Bertie takes his camera lens to some of the most inhospitable locations on Earth, hoping to film iconic species in their natural habitats. In the latest installment of this National Geographic series, Bertie navigates his way to the island of South Georgia, situated between Antarctica and South America, to capture the icy regions fascinating inhabitants.

programme.title: Alberts
programme.desc: Alberts, maza eglīte, kura ir sajūsmā par Ziemassvētkiem, dodas ceļā no stādu audzētavas uz lielpilsētu, lai piepildītu savus sapņus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami. Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili. Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Šodien būs pirmā skolas diena... Ja Rabla komanda pabeigs būvēt skolu! Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Zemes diena, un Padingtonam ir svarīgs uzdevums - iestādīt koku, bet vai viņš atradīs ideālu vietu, pirms ir par vēlu? Bazs rīko pavasara ražas svētkus, un visi tos izbauda, ienesot savas tradīcijas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un robots Padingtrons izbauda varoņu lomu Vindzoru dārzos, bet kas ir tās dīvainās emocijas, ko izjūt robots? Padingtons atklāj, kā būt mierīgam saspringtā situācijā, un varonīgi aptur bēgošu kartingu!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam ir grūti izvēlēties varoni īpašai foto sienai parkā. Varbūt viņam jāmeklē tuvāk mājām. Padingtons kļūst par varonīgu skeitbordistu, pateicoties Mateo un īpašai maskai, bet cik maģiska ir šī maska?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Teilors atklāj, ka ir viņa dzimšanas diena, bet kā lai draugi to padara īpašu, ja viņi par to nezināja? Ir Bērnsa nakts, un Bērdas kundze pastāsta Padingtonam par retu radību, ko sauc par savvaļas hagisu. Vai tas viņus apciemos?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami. Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili. Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļas Ziemassvētki
programme.desc: Rabls nevar sagaidīt, kad pienāks Ziemassvētki, jo viņš cer, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis uzdāvinās viņam lāzerurbi. Kad mērs Hamdingers uzzina, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis ir saaukstējies, viņš izlemj paņemt visas dāvanas sev.

programme.title: Alberts
programme.desc: Alberts, maza eglīte, kura ir sajūsmā par Ziemassvētkiem, dodas ceļā no stādu audzētavas uz lielpilsētu, lai piepildītu savus sapņus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod apburošu aksolotla mazuli. Viņi dodas ceļā, lai nogādātu mazo nerātni mājās. Lielais Sarkanais Cālis iekļūst milzīgā burbulī, kurš viņu nes taisnā ceļā uz vulkānu! Lai viņu glābtu, arī Dorai nākas pacelties gaisā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt. Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottoms brand-new bank in Safe Deposit Krabs, and then in Planktons Pet, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up. 15:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled) 15:15 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.
